# TiMOS-B-24.7.R1 both/x86_64 Nokia 7750 SR
# Generated WED JAN 15 10:30:00 2025 UTC
configure {
    system {
        name "pe-router-01"
        dns {
            address-pref ipv4-only
        }
        management-interface {
            yang-modules {
                nmda {
                    nmda-support true
                }
            }
        }
    }
    router "Base" {
        autonomous-system 65000
        bgp {
            admin-state enable
            connect-retry 120
            group "external" {
                peer-as 65001
                description "Transit Provider A"
                local-address 10.0.0.1
            }
            neighbor "192.168.1.1" {
                group "external"
                description "PE to Transit-A"
            }
        }
        interface "system" {
            ipv4 {
                primary {
                    address 10.255.0.1
                    prefix-length 32
                }
            }
        }
        interface "to-core-1" {
            admin-state enable
            port 1/1/1
            ipv4 {
                primary {
                    address 10.0.0.1
                    prefix-length 30
                }
            }
        }
        ospf 0 {
            area 0.0.0.0 {
                interface "system" {
                    passive true
                }
                interface "to-core-1" {
                    interface-type point-to-point
                }
            }
        }
    }
    service {
        vprn "customer-a" {
            service-id 100
            customer "1"
            autonomous-system 65100
            interface "to-ce-1" {
                sap 1/1/3:100 {
                    ingress {
                        qos 10
                    }
                    egress {
                        qos 10
                    }
                }
                ipv4 {
                    primary {
                        address 172.16.0.1
                        prefix-length 30
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
